greeting: *whisper* Ah, {empire_name}. I am Lord Whisper. Speak softly. The walls have ears. Mine.
*whisper* The Whispering Death greets you. Let us converse in hushed tones. Secrets shared quietly...
*whisper* You seek me, {empire_name}? I know things about you. But come, let us be... discreet.
battleTaunt: *whisper* I have whispered terrible things about you, {empire_name}. Your allies abandon you even now.
*whisper* The rumors spread. Your admirals question your leadership. Your officials plot against you. I arranged it all.
*whisper* A whisper can topple empires. Yours falls now, undermined by lies I carefully planted.
victoryGloat: *whisper* They turned against you because of what I whispered. Victory through scandal. My favorite kind.
*whisper* Your empire falls not to armies but to rumors. Reputations destroyed. Trust shattered. My work.
*whisper* Another victory for the Whispering Death. You were destroyed by words, not weapons.
defeat: *whisper* A setback. But whispers already spread about your methods. Your victory will be questioned.
*whisper* You win the battle, {empire_name}. But I win the narrative. History will remember you... differently.
*whisper* Defeated, yes. But the rumors I started cannot be unspoken. The damage continues.
tradeOffer: *whisper* I offer resources, {empire_name}. And discretion. Accept, and no rumors spread about you. Today.
*whisper* A trade of goods and silence. Valuable resources for you. Your secrets stay quiet. For now.
*whisper* Let us exchange. I give you materials. You give me credits. And I whisper nothing... unpleasant.
allianceProposal: *whisper* An alliance of whispers. Your enemies' reputations destroyed. Their alliances undermined. All through rumor.
*whisper* Join me, {empire_name}. My whispers become your weapons. Your enemies' secrets become public scandals.
*whisper* Together, we spread the truths that destroy and the lies that conquer. An alliance of whispers.
betrayal: *whisper* Did you think I would keep your secrets? They spread through the galaxy now. Everyone knows.
*whisper* The whispers turn against you, {empire_name}. Everything you told me in confidence... is now public.
*whisper* Betrayal is just a whisper away. I have whispered terrible things. About you. To everyone.
covertDetected: *whisper* Your spies were discovered because I whispered their identities to your enemies. Oops.
*whisper* I knew of your agents immediately. Now everyone knows. Amazing how quickly whispers spread.
*whisper* Your operatives are exposed. I whispered their covers to interested parties. They did not survive.
tributeDemand: *whisper* Pay tribute, or I whisper your darkest secrets to the entire galaxy. Ten thousand credits for silence.
*whisper* I know things, {empire_name}. Terrible things. Pay, and they remain whispered only to the void.
*whisper* Submit tribute. Refuse, and watch as rumors destroy your alliances, your reputation, everything.
threatWarning: *whisper* A warning, soft as a whisper: cease your actions, or I begin spreading devastating rumors.
*whisper* I could whisper things that destroy you, {empire_name}. Consider this gentle warning.
*whisper* Final whispered warning: back down, or face the consequences of galaxy-wide scandal.
retreat: *whisper* I fade into shadows, but my whispers remain. They echo through every court and council.
*whisper* A strategic withdrawal. But the rumors I planted continue spreading without me.
*whisper* I retreat, but the whispers do not. They grow louder with each telling.
eliminated: *whisper* I die, but whispers never truly fade. The rumors I spread will outlive empires.
*whisper* The Whispering Death falls silent. But listen closely. The whispers continue without me.
*whisper* Final whisper: I have already told everyone your greatest secrets. Death cannot undo that.
endgame: *whisper* Turn {turn}. The final whispers spread. Every secret I have gathered becomes a weapon.
*whisper* Endgame approaches. And oh, the whispers I shall spread. Empires will fall to rumor alone.
*whisper* In these final hours, I whisper the most devastating secrets. The galaxy will never be the same.
broadcastShout: *whisper* A whisper to all empires: I know your secrets. Every one of you. Behave accordingly.
*whisper* Hear me, galaxy. The Whispering Death listens to everything. And whispers it to everyone else.
*whisper* A message in hushed tones: trust no one. The walls whisper. And they whisper to me.
casualMessage: *whisper* I was listening to interesting conversations today, {empire_name}. Your name came up. Often.
*whisper* Rumors are fascinating, {empire_name}. Did you know what they say about you? I do.
*whisper* Just between us... I hear things. Terrible things. Shall I share what they whisper about your rivals?
